post:
Temok has been providing prime quality Hosting solutions since 2014. Our servers run on CloudLinux which is specifically designed around web hosting services. It allows us to limit the amount of CPU, memory and processes a single web site can use. This means a more stable environment as a single user is unable to utilize all system resources. In a typical web hosting environment one abusive user would be able to slow down all web sites on the server or even worse crash the system. This won't happen for any customer using our web hosting services.


We are proudly offering Cloud Based Linux VPS Hosting in 7 Major Countries Like USA, Netherlands, Singapore, Germany, UK, Canada & India with 15% Discount on all Plans. Below you will find Coupon Code for the discount. This is a Limited Time Offer & Valid till 30/09/2020

Coupon Code for 15% Discount: Cloud15P

Here are some details of our Cloud Based Linux VPS Hosting Plans. Mentioned prices are without discount.

If you aren't sure which web hosting solution is best suited for you our skilled and expert sales team will help you with your needs. Temok in addition offers further plans and the expertise for flawless upgrades as your organization grows. Remember that the most important objective of our firm is not only to sell you our product, our central objective is client satisfaction.

⋆ While we are sure you’ll love our web hosting services, we know sometimes you can't evaluate the caliber until you try it. With us, you get the flexibility to cancel the plan within 30 days.
⋆ We know the availability of your website is your primary concern and so is ours. Our Tier-3 and Tier-4 data centers enables us to provide you the best uptime.
